templates.title: Portainer Agent (Edge: Swarm)
templates.note: Only do this once for your environment, regardless of how many nodes are in the cluster. You do not need to add each node as an individual environment in Portainer. Adding just one node (we recommend the manager node) will allow Portainer to manage the entire cluster.
templates.command: --network portainer_agent_network -e EDGE=1 -e EDGE_INSECURE_POLL=0 -e AGENT_CLUSTER_ADDR=tasks.portainer_edge_agent --mode global --constraint 'node.platform.os == linux' --constraint 'node.platform.os == linux' --mount type=bind,src=//var/run/docker.sock,dst=/var/run/docker.sock --mount type=bind,src=//var/lib/docker/volumes,dst=/var/lib/docker/volumes --mount type=bind,src=//,dst=/host --mount type=volume,src=portainer_edge_agent,dst=/data --name portainer_edge_agent
